item.title: People That Are Really Skillful With Client's Look Here!
item.dc:creator: @Tha_Hartpaint_Dude Tha Hartpaint Dude
item.description:
@Tha_Hartpaint_Dude wrote:

Yes i can, i will edit it when im done.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 05:51:08 am[/size][hr]1. Right click in your client, make a new folder called “Music” (capitall letter include)

  1. Then Right click>new>Java file

  2. In the new .java file you just made add this text into it:

    import java.io.*;

import javazoom.jl.player.Player;

public class MP3Player extends Thread
{

private String filename;
private Player mp3Player;
private boolean started;
private boolean loop;

public MP3Player(String name, boolean loop)
{
    filename = name;
    setLoop(loop);
    start();
}

public void run()
{
    try
    {
        started = true;
        while(loop) 
        {
            mp3Player = new Player(getFis(filename));
            mp3Player.play();
        }
    }
    catch(Exception ioe)
    {
        System.out.println("MP3 error!");
    }
    started = false;
}

public boolean isRunning()
{
    return started;
}

public void close()
{
    setLoop(false);
    mp3Player.close();
}

public void setLoop(boolean loop)
{
    this.loop = loop;
}

private InputStream getFis(String fileName)
{
try
{
    File file = new File(fileName);
    return new FileInputStream(file);
	}
    catch(Exception ioe) {
    System.out.println("File error!");
    return null;
}
}

}

  1. Name this .java file to

Save as: All files
name as: MP3Player.java (capitall letter(s) included.)

  1. make a new .class file and open it with something u can wright in.

  2. Add into that .class file the following:

Êþº¾ 2 S 0 1 2 3 4 5a 6 7 a 8 9 a :a ; < = > ? @ a Aa B Ca D E Fa Ga H filename Ljava/lang/String; mp3Player eLjavazoom/jl/player/Player; astarted Z loop (Ljava/lang/String;Z)V Code LineNumberTable run ()V StackMapTablea ; isRunning ()Z close asetLoop (Z)V getFis )(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/io/InputStream; SourceFile MP3Player.java $ * + I $ javazoom/jl/player/Player , - J e K $ java/lang/Exceptiona L M N MP3 error!a O P Q ) $ java/io/File Q java/io/FileInputStream R File error! MP3Player java/lang/Thread start (Ljava/io/InputStream;)V play java/lang/System out Ljava/io/PrintStream; java/io/PrintStream aprintln (Ljava/lang/String;)V (Ljava/io/File;)V ! e ! ; *· *+µ *¶ *¶ ± " # $ ! Š ;*µ *´ ™ *» aY**´ · · µ *´ ¶ §ÿß§ L² ¶ *µ ± ) , " & e ) ! , - 5 " : # % #Ba & ' ( ! *´ ¬ " ' ) $ ! - *¶ *´ ¶ ± " , - . * + ! " *eµ ± " 2 3 , - ! Y » Y+· M» Y,· °M² ¶ ° " 9 : < = e > % Ra & . /
  1. now your done!!!

To add music: Put a a song (in .mp3 file) in the map called “Music”
Warning! Don’t put any shortcuts to an .mp3 file, otherwise it will not work!

Cheers,

The hartpaint team[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2009, 05:56:12 am[/size][hr]U server needs a play,stop,next and previous button,

Otherwise you will have errors!!!
